Your task is to do a first-pass review of a reliability document for a specific Azure service.

First, tidy the Markdown file by using #file:tidy-markdown-prompt.md.

Second, look for situations where the product name has been used incorrectly throughout the document. For example, look for places where a different product name appears to be used accidentally, or where there's inconsistency in how the product name is presented.
